eolDate: Offical Cats project is no longer maintained.
description:
For Blender 3.0, we recommend using the development (dev) version of the Cats add-on due to several issues found in the main branch.

We recommend upgrading to at least Blender 3.1, as Blender 3.0 has known issues with both the dev version and the master branch of the Cats add-on.

Support is available through the official Cats add-on Discord server.
